item.title: SocialGPT: Prompting LLMs for Social Relation Reasoning via Greedy Segment Optimization
item.description: SocialGPT uses vision and language foundation models for zero-shot social relation reasoning, achieving state-of-the-art results with improved interpretability via Greedy Segment Prompt Optimization.
